p: Total turn-around time from sample to result is in the order of 3 hours 30 minutes thus patients can be informed of the results within half a day. In addition, the testing algorithm inspires a high degree of confidence in that three markers are required for a positive result: pan-flavivirus positive; pan-dengue virus positive; and in the case of this particular outbreak, DENV-2 positive. Furthermore, no subsequent confirmation was required thus removing the lengthy process of sending samples to New Zealand for typing.
